HotelElement.Name: Cotswold Water Park Four Pillars Hotel

Description.Text: With a lakeside setting amidst open countryside, this luxury, modern hotel and spa boasts contemporary designs, fine views and a position within the Cotswold Water Park near Cirencester. The Cotswold Water Park offers a huge range of outdoor activities and water sports, including wake boarding, sailing, horse riding, cycling, fishing, walking and high ropes. Not only perfect for an active break, the hotel is also a peaceful retreat for those who want to appreciate and explore the beautiful Cotswolds.The hotel offers all the comforts of home in 328 well-appointed and airy bedrooms. The excellent range of amenities includes a restaurant, bars and lounges, the luxury health spa and state-of-the-art leisure club. There is free WiFi throughout the hotel and ample parking for guests.
